description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Duplo Marvel
description: Join Spidey, Captain America, and other MARVEL heroes for exciting adventures and pretend-play fun.

name: Turtle WoW: Mysteries of Azeroth
description: A fanmade story expansion inspired by the Warcraft universe of Blizzard Entertainment and developed by the Turtle WoW Team. This expansion aims to take a different path from the Burning Crusade, emphasizing the familiar Azeroth of Vanilla WoW over the cosmic battle with the Burning Legion. While being heavily based on the lore from Warcraft 3 and Vanilla WoW, Mysteries of Azeroth seeks to enhance the game by adding content that matches the already well-established lore of Warcraft Universe.

name: Rally Point 2
description: Sin descripción

name: The Third Wish
description: The Third Wish is a sci-fi point & click adventure about a family and fate and consequence. Full voice acting.

name: Indie Games Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Math & Topology
description: A puzzle that challenges both the topological and mathematical skills of the player. Draw lines, use operator tiles to produce new numbers, and complete levels with square- and hexagon-shaped tiles!

name: Spider
description: A platform game

name: DanSparkling
description: Music/Rhythm/Dance game play with just one PC camera. Of course, you can also use your phone camera.

name: Gigachad Survivals
description: Kill lots of rocking enemies and survive to the end of your gym workout! Gigachad Survivals is a casual game with an emphasis on humor and memes with elements of a simplistic RPG. Here, every decision you make can cause an avalanche of consequences for the hordes of enemies you have to fight!

name: Run On
description: The goal of this game is for the player to reach the goal while avoiding obstacles. Throughout the game, various obstacles appear, and the player's agility and strategic judgment play a crucial role. The game becomes easier for a limited amount of time whenever you obtain certain randomly generated items. Items provide various functions such as , jetpack, speed-up, etc., enhancing the excitement of the game

name: MathGame
description: Are you looking for a math game? Take a look here. In this game, you can experience the joy of mathematics. This game is suitable for primary and secondary schools.

name: High on Life: High on Knife
description: High on Knife is set two years after the ending of the main game, where you and your talking weapons go on an adventure because Knifey received a package from home.

name: Wing Queen
description: Wing Queen is a 2D platformer, cardgame with metroidvania elements , In Wing Queen you will be able to build a deck and choose the combination of skills you prefer, obtain resources, fight against enemies and bosses.

name: Bowling for Apples: A Special Apples to Ashes Episode
description: Short non-canon episode of "Apples to Ashes"

name: A Bit Tied Up
description:
A hero's journey isn't one of constant victory; Thalius knows that extremely well. But he's never down for the count for long. Whenever he's captured by his arch-nemesis Xinali, he's able to use his wiles to piece together clues from the villainous mage's evil monologues in order to get back on his feet.

Except...Thalius didn't get much sleep last night. So when he wakes up with his arms bound to a dungeon wall at the very end of the speech with a menacing silhouette walking away from him, he's kind of at a loss.

name: A Bro's Desire
description:
In this short adventure, Gael navigates through the COVID-filled streets to satisfy a bro's desires. Watch as he suffers in the name of pure friendship (and unrequited feelings?)!

A remake of the 2020 Version, which was made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6.

name: Everhood 2
description: An unconventional arpg where you battle enemies through musical encounters while being accompanied by a Raven who promises you to retrieve your voice if you slay the mighty Mind Dragon!

name: Nexomon 3
description: The upcoming third entry in the Nexomon series, featuring a large, story-rich 3D open world and a new battle system.

name: Go Mecha Ball
description: Go Mecha Ball is an acrobatic action roguelite where you shoot, roll and boost your way through a futuristic wonderland in pursuit of an ever more glitched-out rogue AI. Augment your ball mechs using an increasingly ludicrous arsenal of weapons, abilities and upgrades to shut the glitch portals!

name: LEGO My Style: Preschool
description: LEGO My Style: Preschool is an educational game for children aged 2-4 starring the animal characters from LEGO's Duplo line of toys. There are four learning environments - math, art, music, and language - which players can visit to learn the basics of the aforementioned principles by playing simple mini-games.

name: Drag Her!
description: Drag Her! is a fast, frenetic, and fundamentally fabulous fighting game featuring drag royalty. With a cast of iconic characters from the Drag Race & Dragula universes, Drag Her! gives you the core fighting game fantasy, with an experience that is equal parts stupid and fun.

name: Tiny Terry's Turbo Trip
description: Terry wants to become instantly famous by launching himself into space using his new car. Doing something this cool and reckless will surely make him the talk of the town.

name: Fallout 76: Once in a Blue Moon
description: The Blue Moon rises over the hills of Appalachia, bringing forth new Cryptids to threaten the mercantile progress of the Blue Ridge Caravan Company. Defend their Brahmin herds and trade routes from crazed Cultists and monstrous creatures in two new Public Events and side quests, plus face enemies infected with a deadly new Daily Ops mutation for a chance to earn new rewards!

name: Hi-Fi Rush: Arcade Challenge
description: This Hi-Fi Rush Arcade Challenge Update adds two new challenge modes to the game. The two new modes are BPM Rush and Power Up Tower Up, each with their own challenges and rewards to unlock.

name: Virgil's Purgatory
description: Virgil's Purgatory is a port of the 2016 PC metroidvania platformer with the same name for the ZX Spectrum about a man called Virgil who was decapitated, and now he must wander through his own purgatory in search of his true head and perhaps eternal rest. Take your chances with this little metroidvania game.

name: Virgil's Purgatory EX
description: Virgil's Purgatory EX is an expanded port of the ZX Spectrum version of the game for the MSX, with an updated level design, two new areas, an extra boss, and much more.

name: Hauntsfield
description: Hauntsfield is a short Halloween RPG designed for Game Boy. Play time is about 40-60 minutes. The game has spooky themes, but isn't scary and is appropriate for kids & adults alike.

name: RollerGirl
description: A nostalgic Adventure-Narrative game set in 2010 in small-town Ontario. Explore the local neighbourhood on rollerblades as Naomi

name: Dead by Daylight: End Transmission
description: Dead by Daylight’s End Transmission Chapter features a new Killer – The Singularity – and a new Survivor, Gabriel Soma. A new Map, Toba Landing, is available for all players. Purchasing this add-on unlocks 2 exclusive Cosmetics: The Singularity’s Curved Scythe and Gabriel’s Illuminated Shirt.

name: Magic or Machinations
description: Design your own character and choose their personality with a dialogue between you and a sentient AI drone in the middle of space. Then wake up in an open-world desert and try to find your way home by discovering new abilities and using them to cross time and space.

name: The Sims 4: Horse Ranch
description: Work hard and play hard with animal friends and your own stretch of land in The Sims 4 Horse Ranch Expansion Pack.

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Kuniyoshi
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: The Last Hero of Nostalgaia: The Rise of Evil
description: Embark on a new adventure and delve deeper into the lands of Nostalgaia. Go where nostalgia, tradition, and progress converge, awaiting your heroism to mould the landscape anew. Stand against the onslaught of mighty new adversaries and forge your legacy as a harbinger of change.

name: World War 0x
description:
World War 0x is a multiplayer FPS game set during a World War 3 conflict with a low poly art style.

The game features real world locations such as Odesa Port.

Tons of weapon options to choose from like rifles, snipers, shotguns, RPGs and pistols.

Vehicles like armored cars, tanks, helicopters and fighter jets help you get around fast.

name: Wonderland of Carbuncle
description: This is a comical action game starring Carbuncle. Part of MSX2 Disc Station volume #25.

name: Puyo Puyo Love Story
description: Released in MSX2 Disc Station volume #29.

name: Madou Monogatari Episode II: Carbuncle
description: This prototype version of Madou Monogatari II was released in Disc Station's 1989 Special Christmas Edition to promote the then-upcoming Madou Monogatari 123, and is thus the first entry in the Madou Monogatari series.

name: Bayoen Wars: Daimadou Senryaku Monogatari
description: Released in Vol 5, Daimadou Senryaku Monogatari is a turn-based strategy game.

name: Moekan
description: An anarchistic country that is said to dominate the world exists on a vast island known as Moekko Island. This is where the final works of AC Company's android combat maids (resembling beautiful young girls) are done, also where these maids get there communication training. A new maid is to come to the island to be trained, Rinia, she is a young looking girl, who has lost her all of her memories, she tries very hard to impress the owner at Moekko island, but just ends up making a lot of trouble around the mansion. Takahiro, the owner of Moekko island, a depressive young man who has also lost his memories is seen as a very unhappy person who thinks Rinia will only be trouble around the mansion. As time passes, Takahiro slowly grows attached to Rinia's attempted ways of helping and so starts a beautiful relationship among the quiet island.

name: Artificer's Tower
description: Are you the master of the magical arts? Prove it in this new colony-sim wizard tower defense game. Build your base, keep your mages happy, craft recipes, research new magics, and defend your wizard's keep. Will your Artificer's Tower be the envy of all your magical friends?

name: This Is Crying
description: Traverse distorted memories.

name: Dance Dance Revolution A3
description: Dance Dance Revolution A3 (pronounced Ace Three) is the 18th installment of the Dance Dance Revolution arcade series in Japan, and the sequel to Dance Dance Revolution A20 Plus. The game was released as an update on golden cabinets in Japan on March 17, 2022, including those imported in the United States. An upgrade for older cabinets was released in Asia (including Japan, South Korea, and several other countries), Australasia, and the United States (Hawaii only) on June 22, 2022.

name: Monster Mop Up
description: Rescue the scared little Ragamuffins from the human world- and clean up all evidence of their existence. Mop stains, burn poop, and get rewarded with high tech gear and upgrades. Save enough, and you can even expand your home, decorate it, and live happily ever after with your fluffy little friends!

name: Tales Up
description:
Tales Up is a cooperative role-playing game, a blend of board game and interactive stories such as “choose your own adventure” books.

You’ll find zombies, pirates, vikings… Hijinks and surprises will ensue!

name: As usual.
description:
"Today, as usual."

This is a linear atmospheric game.
There are no loud scares, so please use headphones!
Some grotesque imagery is present, if it's not to your liking please refrain from playing.

name: White Hearts
description: White Hearts is a Ren'Py visual novel set at the Ecole Lyceé Saint Louis de Gonzague, prestigious university in Paris, where Rosaire is the only male student. Players holding a White Hearts NFT have access to the game via the token gated website.

name: Flappy KFP
description: A Flappy Bird clone about a KFP Employee trying to make their way to work. Don't fall into the fryer!

name: Ratchet & Clank: Going Commando
description: A remaster of the PlayStation 2 Ratchet & Clank: Going Commando, featuring 720p HD with support for 3D graphics and PlayStation Network trophies.

name: Eiketsu Taisen
description: Eiketsu Taisen is a real-time strategy card-based arcade game developed by Sega.

name: Ratchet & Clank
description: A remaster of the PlayStation 2 Ratchet & Clank, featuring 720p HD with support for 3D graphics and PlayStation Network trophies.

name: Construction Simulator: Airfield Expansion
description: With the Construction Simulator: Airfield Expansion, fans of heavy construction machines can look forward to the most extensive expansion for Construction Simulator to date. The DLC opens up access to a new construction campaign on each of the game's two maps, so you will get the exciting opportunity to build a new airfield for the respective region. Within these huge campaigns, it’s not only a matter of preparing, levelling and asphalting the runways - of course, the control towers, terminals and hangars have to be built too!

name: Shin Megami Tensei II
description:
Shin Megami Tensei II is a port of the PlayStation remake of Shin Megami Tensei II with new content exclusive to Game Boy Advance version. However, this port also has washed out colors and lower quality music than its PlayStation counterpart, due to hardware capabilities of Game Boy Advance.

The gameplay uses first-person navigation of dungeons and turn-based battles against demons. The player can recruit demons as allies by talking to them rather than fighting them, and two to three demons can be fused to create new demons.

name: Chojiro
description:
"The wandering ronin.
Night breeze carries the scent of burnt horse flesh to his nostrils.
He follows it through the weeds, and comes across a village ablaze.
What horrors unfurled here...?"
This is a small horror game on itch.io made for a game jam. Gives ps1 vibes with its visuals.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Up Your Arsenal
description: A remaster of the PlayStation 2 Ratchet & Clank: Up Your Arsenal, featuring 720p HD with support for 3D graphics and PlayStation Network trophies.

name: Bandit Brawler
description: Robberies, mugging, stealing, picking pockets, and wreaking havoc in a beautiful medieval world - it all waits for you in Bandit Brawler. Follow orders from a magical rooster, pick fights with everyone around, and blow up a couple of patrols. You know, like back in the ol'days.

name: Stride: Fates
description: Step into the shoes of a parkour spec-ops officer. Traverse your way through the rooftops and basements of dystopian Airon City - from slums to affluent skyscrapers. Deal with power shifts in gangs, dirty family feuds, corporate secrets, forbidden tech, and other obstacles to understand your past.

name: Shootout
description:
SHOOTOUT is VR multiplayer experience where you become your own hero.

Explore a variety of weapons and modifiers to discover over 1000 unique combinations and abilities to build the loadout that YOU want to play. Change your playstyle and role mid match to adapt quicky to the game and competition. You are one part swap away from becoming a carry, support or mobility hero.

Express yourself with a catalog of customizables and impose your style on the opposition.
Explore the depth that this game has to offer and strategize in a PvE arena and then jump into 3v3 PvP Game Modes to battle it out with other players.

Play with friends or battle alone through an expanding playlist of maps and game modes, and prove once and for all..

name: Path to Salvation
description: Sin descripción

name: Combine Supermax
description: Sin descripción

name: A Friendly Reminder
description: Sin descripción

name: Winter Intrusion
description: Sin descripción

name: A Dire Emergency in Space
description: Sin descripción

name: Trainwreck
description: Sin descripción

name: Kate
description: Sin descripción

name: David Slade Mysteries: Case Files 2 - The Riverside Slasher
description: Sin descripción

name: David Slade Mysteries: Case Files
description: Sin descripción

name: David Slade Mysteries: Case Files - Definitive Edition
description: Take to the dark and violent streets of downtown Riverside, where you investigate gruesome and violent homicides using a range of Forensic tools and your wits! Inspired by the classic Police Quest adventure series, reborn & reimagined for VR.

name: CoasterMania
description: CoasterMania is a physics-based VR rollercoaster game where you create the ride of your life! Use wacky contraptions and elements to fly through the sky, then experience your creation by jumping in the front seat.

name: Atlas Endgames
description: Squad up and embark on a quest to become the ultimate champion of the Atlas Endgames, a tournament where ruthless heroes from across the galaxy fight to pursue fortune, glory, or a burning desire for revenge.

name: Genotype
description: Your weapons are alive! Print creatures and use them as weapons and tools as you explore this Metroidvania FPS adventure. Morph yourself tiny, upgrade, and locate collectibles to advance to the next boss. Explore large non-linear maps and explore an environment woven together with a complex story.

name: Snow Wars VR
description: Step into the immersive world of Snow Wars. Gather your friends and prepare for thrilling snowball battles with up to 8 players, where skill and strategy will lead you to victory.

name: Sakura Shadow Monsters
description: Challenging platform game where you control Sakura, a character with a different personality. Your mission is to rescue your girlfriend who is in the middle of a zombie apocalypse (or not) and leave the island.

name: Tin Hearts
description: A VR port of Tin Hearts

name: Mindset
description: Take on an intellectual challenge and use your wits to solve dozens of intriguing cube-shaped puzzles while unraveling the mystery of your past.

name: Mecha Force
description: Mecha Force is an immersive and exciting VR experience that blends the thrill of mecha action with the unpredictability of a roguelike game. Players are transported to a world in turmoil, where they must defend against both internal and external threats as they take control of their very own mecha. This is no ordinary machine, however; the player is able to customize and personalize their mecha, choosing from a diverse range of artillery and melee weapons to create their own formidable war machine.

name: Pneumata VR
description: VR version of Pneumata!

name: Tennis On-Court
description: The ultimate VR Tennis simulator. Play with your friends or worldwide competitors in 1vs1 and 2vs2 online mode. Or practice in match against AI and various exercices. Physics has been worked with top players to transpose real tennis in VR.

name: Outta Hand
description:
Outta Hand is a high-energy platforming adventure that lets you embody one of the Hand-People, wide-eyed, hop-happy lab experiments with the power to jump great heights, leap impossible lengths, and shake hands from… really, really far away. Like a whole big dining room away.

Due to not being dumb enough, loveable as you are, Dr. Vendelvom has selected you for immediate termination. Not like fired gone, more like dead gone.

To save yourself and your brethren, you must platform, jump, bounce, and punch your way through the evil doctor’s laboratory with your… uh… very long arms, to take down him and all his baddies. With multiple levels and boss fights along with an endless mode, things might get, shall we say, a little bit “out of hand?” Get it?! No? Fine…

name: Inverse
description:
The Foundation wanted to advance teleportation technology. What they found was a pathway to a dangerous world beyond our own, and they opened the door to the creatures that inhabit it.
Inverse is played in 4-v-1 matches. Play co-op as the Agents, working together to restore power to the control terminals. Or play solo as the Nul monster, corrupting and incapacitating anyone you can find.

name: Contractors Showdown
description: Contractors Showdown delivers adrenaline-fueled VR combat with two distinct modes: fast-paced Battle Royale and the immersive, tactical Exfil Zone. Customize your loadout, complete missions, and fight to survive in dynamic, high-stakes battles. Gear up, squad up, and dominate the VR battlefield!

name: Throwback
description: Throwback is set in a bright retro-futuristic world, you'll need to catch and thow newspapers to build up your highscore.

name: Paint the Town Red VR
description: Paint the Town Red VR is a virtual reality version of the popular first-person melee brawler.

name: Floor Plan 2: Backside Story
description: Floor Plan 2: Backside Story, featuring more floors and more puzzles.

name: Requisition VR: Survival Update
description: Requisition VR is a physics based, co-op melee game.

name: Espire 2: Mixed Reality Update
description: Featuring intense stealth action that takes place in your own home via mixed reality.

name: Drums Rock: Undertale DLC
description: Drums Rock is an arcade drum game for VR, follow the rock rhythm with your drums and crush the demons. Each note is represented by an enemy, and they will be defeated by playing the drums.

name: Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate - Episode III: End of Hallucinations
description: Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate - Episode III: End of Hallucinations is a VR crime Investigation game.

name: The Burst
description: The Burst is a smashing high-speed VR shooter. Play as a spec ops operative to bring down the tyrannical warband leader and her goons. Restore order on a prison planet the best way you can - with violence.

name: Hermes e Renato: Joselito Contra a Farofada
description: Hermes e Renato: Joselito Contra a Farofada is a mobile game where you shoot fireworks at people who wants to ruin your day.

name: Dungeon Full Dive
description: Gather your party and play your favorite tabletop RPGs. With DFD, you can bring your fantasy worlds to life! Create and customize your own heroes & maps. Experience your adventures from the eyes of your miniature or using a classical TTRPG top-down mode!

name: Chrono Hunter
description: Step into the thrilling world of Chrono Hunter, a native VR immersive adventure that combines enjoyment of FPS, Roguelite, and RPG genres. As a time traveler agent equipped with amazing abilities and weapons to explore to experience through diverse and meticulously crafted levels.

name: Battle Bows
description: Grab your bow and rain magical arrows down from your castle tower. Defend the castle heart against increasingly challenging waves of evil balloons and defeat difficult giant bosses in this epic VR tower defense game. Play online co-op mode or solo and climb to the top of the seasonal leaderboards!

name: Micro Machines: Mini Challenge Mayhem
description: Relive the golden days of adolescence, racing Micro Machines around tracks, but using the power of VR to bring otherwise impossible courses, stunts and speed to life.

name: Ragnarock: Sabaton Raid
description: This new DLC for the Rhythm game Ragnarock brings you a unique collaboration with the epic band Sabaton.

name: Arashi: Castles of Sin - Final Cut
description: Become one with the shadows with the award winning VR shinobi adventure. Master the art of stealth-action as you infiltrate castles across feudal Japan with your arsenal of weapons, tools, and techniques, outwitting all enemies on your quest to defeat the Six Oni of Iga.

name: Penalti MTV com Cléston
description: Penalti MTV com Cléston is a penalty soccer mobile game based around the Rockgol tournament featuring the musician and goalkeeper DJ Cléston.

name: PalMz' Insane Warfare Mod
description: The game is pretty much the same, but sort of amplified with all the possible units implemented, 250 pop-limit and a special method to make bot send bigger forces.

name: Arcanox
description: Arcanox was a fantasy themed blend of collectible cards, tower defense and combat strategy MMO released in 2015. You collected and crafted cards, built your castle, attacked castles of other players, stole gold, joined/created guilds and competed against other guilds in the dungeons. The dungeons were randomly generated levels which had to be solved with the least number of cards to get a high score. The game server was shutdown in October 2020.

name: Bump Sheep
description:
A herd of black sheep and a herd of white sheep wander and graze in the Great Plains. In order to eat the best grass in the grassland, they start a contest to determine which herd will win.

Bump Sheep has a unique mix of good strategy and quick reflex. You can play it in single-player mode against the computer. Or you can play it with your friend in the same device for more fun.

name: Finger Football: Goal in Two
description: Take aim and shoot! Can you make the goal in just two shots in this relaxing and minimalist finger football puzzle game.

name: JumpJump
description: JumpJump is a very popular casual game that only requires pressing and releasing two actions. It is a simple gameplay, but it has a lot of difficulty. Compare who jumps farther and whose score is higher. Come and play!

name: Cambrian Dawn: Biceratopsidae DLC
description: Welcome 11 brand new species from the Family Biceratopsidae into your game!

name: Castle Crafter
description: A Craft online battle game in a voxel world with many single and online game modes like deathmatch and capture the flag.

name: Puzzled Towers
description: This is a tower defense style game set in a dynamic first person world. You create the enemy path in real time. The Alpha Stage comes with a free unlocked steam achievement.

name: Hoppy Square DX
description: It's hip to be square, and no square is hipper or hoppier than a Hoppy Square!

name: Stack,Clack,Clock!
description: Stack, Clack, Clock! is a game about stacking bricks, where players build a tower one brick at a time.

name: Project Speed: Njarovik
description: Do you want to play on a new map, but on the original Project Speed game? This DLC is for you! - This DLC adds the Njarovik map from Project Speed 2 to Project Speed.

name: Grapploteer
description: A puzzle platformer about a defect robot where you grapple from wall to wall and escape the factory. Pixel art graphics and many music tracks. Head through factories, sewers, trash dumps and cities to find freedom.

name: Don't Stop
description: This is an adventure game, you will use modern firearms to fight against strange alien creatures, collect various props and skills to survive.

name: Pine Creek: The Book of Judith
description: A cozy-thriller adventure game focused on exploration, story, and following clues. Have friends, think about life, think about death, eat tasty food, and play games in the arcade!

name: Rusty Lines Remastered
description: We'd like to introduce to you yet another re-make of a widely known "Color Lines" game which we called "Rusty Lines"
1125899906842624 is a modified version of 2048 set in a 64x64 grid.

name: Theft Ride Legacy: Extended Edition
description:
Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure in "Theft Ride Legacy"!
Bundle includes an "Extra Mission Pack" !

name: Rice Bowl Restaurant
description: Challenge yourself to serve the best Mixed Indonesian Rice dish and make your customers happy

name: Party Party Time + Premium Pack Set
description: Party hearty with the Party Fever Pack, Party Harder Pack, Party Even Harder Pack, and Excitement Pack downloadable content bundle for Party Party Time! Let's party till we drop!

name: Gramik Paint Roller
description: Can you win this challenge?

name: Arcade Archives: Megablast
description: Feast on a four-way firing frenzy!!

name: Mountain Climb Driver
description: Break into extreme racing - go through a high-speed hill climb, complete the race and become the "King of the Hill"!

name: Medieval Royal Chess: Classic Board Game
description: Chess is a very old and very popular board game for logic and mind in the style of the Middle Ages!

name: Car Drag Racing Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: G-Mode Archives+: Game Tengoku
description: Sin descripción

name: JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Digital Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Monoshiri Quiz: Sekai no Doubutsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Konna Tokoro ni? Mitsuketa!
description: Sin descripción

name: Tate's Journey
description: Have you ever wanted to live and experience the life of Tate? Live the epic life! In Tate's Journey, you can experience Tate's life in real-time in both single-player and multiplayer mode. Collect coins to unlock vehicles, airplanes, helicopters and more! Unlock Tate bro, Tate chick and numerous other characters!

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - NES Demake
description: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - NES Demake is an unofficial demake of Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney for the Nintendo Entertainment System.

name: Sentimental Death Loop
description: Just as you begin to settle in for a fun day at your best friend's house, something changes in her and she kills you. And not just once—she ends your life time and time and time again. Your goal is to escape from this endless loop of despair.

name: Ordinary Rooms
description:
You are Joey, a very curious person who likes to explore the abandoned places. This time, you read the newspaper about the abandoned facility and decided to go there to explore.

Game inspired from Roblox Rooms.

Menu music by chromestones

name: Combats
description: Russian-language multiplayer browser role-playing game

name: Love Com: Punch de Cont.
description: Based in the original manga, the player assumes the role of Risa Koizumi as she interacts with other characters. The players choices guide Risa down one of the many available endings.

name: Violet Storm
description: Neon space shooter arcade.

name: Shot Shot Shoot
description:
This game is catering to the iPad's unique strengths as a beautiful social gaming platform of the future. Shot Shot Shoot is part of a new way of playing games with your friends, combining the magic of computers with the special interactions made possible by board games.
The goal of the game is simple: destroy the five squares on the opponent's side of the board. Maneuver single shots with high precision or overwhelm the other player with massive attack waves – a fun mixture of fast-paced gameplay and deep strategy!

name: Light the Night
description: Endless runner with a lightning bug flying over the water, collecting bonuses.

name: Color Dots
description: A serene landscape of color and zen - but only if you meditate and focus can you pass!

name: Safari Toy Factory
description: When being a child, everyone dreams of having a small elephant or lion, to be his best friend, to take care of him. You decide to go to the jungle to the toys producing factory . You have to prove that you can create jungle toys, collect and pack the toys into their boxes for sale.

name: Hex-Mix
description: Hex-Mix is based on color matching and hand-eye coordination mixed with cognitive enhancing mechanics, this game is perfect for young players!

name: Pretty Bubble: Flappy Adventures
description: In Endless underwater world, very cute hero is trying to pass the obstacles. You join this adventure.

name: Hoppy Frog
description:
Jump from cloud to cloud, collecting gold flies along the way. Tap in the air to open Hoppy's parachute and clear longer distances. Beware of jumping Electric Eels and the hungry 'Sharky' in the waters below!
Hoppy Frog is the latest all-new addictive game for iOS featuring fast paced platform action and chiptune soundtrack by '8 Bit Weapon'.

Fresh and unique numbers merged gameplay.
Not only 1900, but more than 2048! Kidding...This is harder...Very more harder...
Can you merge number bigger than 2048? Or bigger than 1900?Or bigger than 1010?
Nope...Merge number bigger than 190 can be genius in 1900!

name: Elephant Rampage
description: Man will Regret for Killing Elephants just for their tusk which brought elephants on the edge of extinction.

name: Cyclopong
description:
Platform with 3 ping pong rackets rotates.
Tap on the screen to flip rotation direction and bounce the ball around. Bounce it as long as you can!
Longer you keep bouncing it, better score you get.

name: Dream Gym
description: Build your own gym from scratch and get an enjoyable experience of making it grow into a huge fitness hall full of happy customers. Be your own boss, trainer, manager and decor stylist. Give your clients the right work-out and get paid for that. Watch your characters' body shape change advancing level by level.

name: Worrrm Rebirth
description:
Keep escaping from the expanding and contracting worm.
You can move the character by tilting the device (mobile phone). When entering a round stage, points will be added. Compete how much points you can overlap without being caught by the worm.

name: BeaverKarts
description: Show who’s the coolest Beaver in the whole valley by doing awesome tricks & flips. Beat your friends’ high score in weekly tournaments and challenge them through Facebook!

name: Max Awesome
description: Take it to the max and become a daredevil legend. Learn to wheelie, jump, duck, and flip then put your skills to the test through 60 perilous courses. Complete over 100 objectives, buy and unlock new skills, and challenge your Facebook friends to top your record scores.

name: Scavenger Hunt: Switzerland
description:
In Scavenger Hunt: Switzerland you have to solve various puzzles to reach the goal. The puzzles lead you across Switzerland in different levels.
To master the levels and the puzzles you need internet access and a web browser!
The game will be available in English and German.

name: Bubble Box: 6 In 1
description: When you see your screen is full of bubbles, can you keep your fingers from tapping them? Enjoy the fun of popping bubbles and compete with world wide players for top score.

name: Fix the Leaks
description:
Help tiny critters fix the yummy jelly leaks!
Once upon a time, a scientist created a machine to make jelly. But once the machine was built, there was an explosion and now a strange goo is pouring into the whole house. Luckily for him, his experimental creatures turned out to love the taste, and thus he discovered a solution...

name: Wipeout Dash 2
description: Wipeout Dash 2 steps up the challenge with its brand new “swipe control” system to take on all new physics puzzles! Millions of gamers around the globe took on the challenges that the original Wipeout Dash had to offer but we ask … “Are you ready for more?” Wipeout Dash 2 has all new levels with all new challenges for you to come out swiping in all directions to see if you can be the ball … or Wipeout!

name: Juggling BBQ HD
description:
You have sliced fruits, now it’s time to skewer and make the perfect BBQ !
Juggling BBQ is a fast and funny action game for everyone to enjoy ! Pin some food pieces with dexterity while flying in the air to become the ultimate skewer chef master !

name: Adventures of JoJo & ToTo
description:
The ultimate educational tool for your child from toddler to elementary school. Learn to read, match, spell, add, subtract, multiply and sharpen their motor skills all in one app!
JoJo and ToTo are two monkeys who love to play with their friends LoLo, DoDo and HoHo. But JoJo has a problem, he doesn't like being a monkey.
Does he become a lion? Or a donkey? Find out!
There are two versions of the story; a "big kid" story for elementary school kids and a "little kid" story for toddlers and pre-schoolers.
Your child will learn to believe in themselves as JoJo learns and experiences how other animals live.

name: Pinball Maniacs
description: Fun and wacky Pinball Adventure! Pinball Maniacs is a fun pinball adventure where Justin and his friends embark on an epic treasure hunt, encountering dangerous enemies along the way. An original mix of Pinball and Breakout, Pinball Maniacs refreshes the pinball genre and introduces new patterns of enemies and explosive power ups. Discover our 2 Tables: Pirate Bay and Dragon Castle. Each one comes with original adventures to complete and treasures to collect.

name: Finger Gravity
description:
Want to prove your talent on Hand-brain coordination? Just challenge this game.
In a world without gravity, you will bump into various monsters on your way to destination. Use your fingers as the motor engine and steering wheel, and drive as fast as possible to finish the race. Hi, boy, drift like a racing car!
Aside from simple and stuning game graphics, a variety of challenging stages, brand new challenge modes and diversified mini games are waiting for you!

name: Finger Dash
description:
Addictive Warning...this game is highly addictive!!
5 seconds, 10 seconds or 30 seconds…how long can you last? Keep moving to survive…stop and you’re dead! Sounds simple, doesn’t it? ...Perhaps in the beginning, but things get nasty later on and that’s when you’ve got to put the pedal to the metal!
Finger Dash your way through the chaos of blue blocks and psychedelic environments, protecting your yellow block from colliding with certain destruction!
So what are you waiting for? Download Finger Dash and find out.
But be warned...this game is highly addictive!!

name: CleverMonkey
description:
A new game capsize the traditional game play of casual puzzle genre.
CleverMonkey innovate a series puzzle solving module, on the other word, a brand new game play approach based on the level design of catapult puzzle mechanism.
The sports fans Rebecca foster a clever monkey ,but before she took a field trip she forgot leave food to feed the monkey , therefore ,the monkey enforced to search and get diversity food via his intelligence on his own, WOW what's a smart and comely monkey .
CleverMonkey is a puzzle genre game which comprised variety physical effects , went through catapult methods to fulfill wide spectrum of puzzle solution, as a player, you will experienced significant and tremendous satisfaction and exiting which a puzzle genre possibly can brought, moreover, the 90 omnipresent joyful levels will ultimately challenge your limitation of intelligence .

name: Red Remover Blast
description:
Red Remover Blast is the explosive spin-off of hit puzzle game Red Remover.
The gameplay is different this time around. Instead of tapping red shapes to remove them you must use explosions to knock them off the screen. Don't knock any green shapes off though or you'll fail the level. To add to the fun there are 8 planes of gravity - look at the shapes faces to see which way they will fall.
Too easy? Try replaying the game in the extra challenging coin mode!

name: Ball of Woe
description: It's bizarre! It's dark! It's colorful! It's cute! It makes you want to brush your teeth! It's.... Ball of Woe!

name: PenguinLinks v2
description: Do you love penguins? Then you got to love this fun puzzle game with cute penguins in costumes, representing all kinds of characters from your daily life: such as Lisa Simpson, Rodger Federer, Super Mario, Judoka player, Hulk, Cartman, incredibles, Viking, ... and many many more. Try this game and see if you can identify each of them!

name: Mutton for Punishment 3
description: Mutton for Punishment - Endurance gaming just got tasty! The survival of your flock is at stake. Deep in the hills of Wales, you must defend your flock against the vicious wolf. In Mutton for Punishment’s rapid-fire game, you must use your sling shot to protect your flock and destroy the pesky wolfs flaming arrows before they flambé them! Launch the stones from your slingshot at the correct time to destroy the arrows and collect baawsome power-ups.

name: Turtles, Huh?: Learn to Fly
description:
Turtles, Huh? The game has 1 Main game and 9 Mini-games. The game has 2 characters: Turtle and Penguin. The game has 88 missions and 40 achievements. The game is so much fun that you will find challenging in all the nine games.
Mini-games: The games are designed for the mini-game lovers. You will find challenging in the games. Can you get grade "A"s in all the mini-games?
Main game: 88 missions are waiting for you to complete! Upgrade your equipments, fly as far as possible, Destroy all the obstacles and get all 7 Turtle Balls. Huh? What are the Turtle Balls? The legend said when someone gets all the 7 balls, he will get the power to conquer the world!

name: Talk Tac Toe Lite
description:
A cool spin on tic-tac-toe. Each character icon has it’s own catch phrase as you place it on the board. Also have fun uploading your own funny faces with our upload feature.
Talk-Tac-Toe is the most basic of games but with this cool twist it will keep your kids entertained on long car rides and bring friends and family together with and old school game.

name: Magnetball Lite
description:
MagnetBall is played by bouncing iron balls straight at red magnets to get points. Each ball falls from above by gravitational force. You must bounce the ball using a steel bar. The bar is controlled by your finger sliding over the iPhone/iPod screen. Control can also be had by using a multi-touch interface. This will give enhanced angle and speed control. If you like a challenge, this is it!
This game has many levels. You must avoid penalties for missed balls to advance. Difficult magnet locations and external forces make successive levels more challenging. Bonuses are awarded for reaching a level without losing any balls.

name: Monsters Tap Tap Music Battle University
description: Everybody Loves to dance… Even monsters! In this exciting dance game you will play as the craziest, funniest, coolest, fastest, cutest & most awesome monsters you have ever seen.

name: Golf Odyssey 2
description:
Golf Odyssey 2 is the ultimate relaxing and challenging experience in a golf game.
Don't be fooled by the laid-back soundtrack, the amazing atmosphere or the beautiful pixel art. Golf Odyssey 2 can be that moment of calm and peace to disconnect from your daily stress, or that relentless game where you must perfect your hitting and your play style.
Start your career and complete new and challenging courses to reach the top. Prove your worth and become a real golf king!

name: Dungeon Abyss
description:
Dungeon Abyss is a turn based rogue-lite procedural dungeon crawler, in which you can explore various worlds trying to regain the lost light that was stolen, to reestablish the balance and discover your true nature in the process.
Several procedural generated worlds, the game is still in beta, new worlds and features will be added in future releases, thank you for your comprehension and support.
You can also have fun in the creation mode in which you can create your own dungeon, with the resources unlocked while exploring worlds.

name: Fruit Battle: Survival
description:
Get ready for an addictive and action-packed adventure with "Fruit Battle - Survival"! In this 2D mobile game, you play as a brave strawberry that has been kidnapped and locked in a cage. You have no choice but to fight for your survival by battling one vegetable per day on sugar islands.
Each battle takes place on an island made of sugar blocks that can be destroyed by either you or your enemy. As you destroy the blocks, the island gets smaller and it becomes easier to fall off. Falling off the island means falling into the cave where a worm is waiting with a plate to eat the loser of the game.
To survive the day, you must knock down the vegetable off the island before the vegetable knocks you down. You can use your gun to shoot at the enemy, knocking them back. But that's not all - each character, whether it be the strawberry or the vegetable, has a unique superpower that can be used during the battle. These superpowers are much stronger than getting knocked back by a gun, and they can be the key to your survival!
With each passing day, the battles get harder, and the vegetables become stronger. Can you survive the challenge and become the ultimate Fruit Battle champion? You'll have to rely on your skills, wits, and strategic use of your superpowers to come out on top.
But it's not just about surviving. "Fruit Battle - Survival" features cute and colorful graphics that will keep you entertained for hours on end. The game's fun and quirky characters, from the strawberry to the broccoli, will keep you engaged and entertained as you battle your way through the game.

name: Dream Mini Golf: Putt Star
description:
Welcome to one of the craziest game of golf you've ever played. Play your way through some of the most whackiest courses. Get mesmerised in this beautiful work of art.
Each level you come across will be very unique and different from the previous level you played, discover the best way to get a Hole in One. The game features a very simple and easy to play gameplay. All you have to do is Aim and power up your shot and shoot for an eagle, but you will also make sure that you complete each level within the given time. Do you think your game to face the challenge head on beat it. Compete against your friends in our online leaderboards, show the world your the best. The game does not feature any in-app purchases you just need to play smart and unlock all the 5 unique themes

name: Racing in Motor
description:
Third person view perspective, better graphics and real car sounds.Riding motorcycle is the best mobile racing game you have been looking for.
Tilt your device to drag your motor wherever you want, overtake traffic, earn coins and buy new motor. Tilt your device to lean your bike and touch the screen to accelerate/brake.

name: Fingertrainer
description:
Go harder, longer and stronger with the brand new "FingerTrainer" App.
Lift the weights up and down till your muscles scream!

name: Shooting Genius
description: Shooting Genius is an archery game. It is a game that shoots bows to hit apples arranged at different heights. Bombs are also mixed, so you should avoid them and hit the apple. To play the game, tap the screen and pull back to release. It is a game that can continue endlessly.

name: Dungeon Restaurant
description:
In the deep dungeons somewhere.. A place where adventurers quench their thirst…
The store hours are from 12 A.M. to 12 P.M... People cal this store the "Dungeon Delicacy". All dishes are made with the monsters that live in this dungeon.
Do customers come? More than you think...

name: Perfect Slices
description: Chop like a real master. It's so satisfying!

name: Bitcoin Escape
description:
How long can you survive in this digital escape game? You need to have superpowers to do well in this game, because you cannot tell if you are going down a dead end until it’s too late.
Mt Gox has been hacked and now Bitcoins have been scattered across the digital landscape. To contain the extent of the breach, the authorities are quickly moving to turn off mining servers and lock accounts, destroying millions of Bitcoin in the process. It is up to you to gather as much of the loose Bitcoin that you can before it is destroyed, but be warned, the path is full of perilous traps awaiting just one mis-calculation on your part. The future of Bitcoin (and your own personal fortune) is in your hands.

name: Alphaville
description: Build words in a 3D universe of letters in a race against time. Unlock specials as you spell your way through the increasingly challenging levels. Fun for word game fans and action fans alike. Plus, improving your spelling skills is a nice side bonus.

name: Crank Crawl
description: Tactical dungeon puzzler

name: Voidblazers
description: Voidblazers is a story-driven shoot 'em up game for Playdate. Join the crew of Icarus as they travel across the galaxy, battle various fleets, and encounter new friends and enemies on their daring mission.

name: Tex'em
description: A Texas hold'em poker game for Playdate. The wildest game in the wilderness!

name: Crusader Kings II: Dynasty Starter Pack
description: Newcomers to Crusader Kings II should not go to war empty handed. This starter pack gathers all the essential content players need in one handy bundle. With this pack, you will have access to every Christian, Pagan and Muslim realm in Europe and the Mediterranean, as well as a key role playing expansion that brings the intricacies of courtly drama alive on your screen.

name: Crusader Kings II: Royal Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Crusader Kings II: Imperial Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Crusader Kings II: The Reaper's Due Content Pack
description: The Crusader Kings II: The Reaper's Due Content Pack contains a Portrait Pack detailing the east African provinces and a Clothing Pack focusing on the late Byzantine Empire. In addition to these, there are fifteen new models for both Eastern and African councilors.

name: Crusader Kings II: Conclave Content Pack
description:
The Conclave Content Pack pack includes:

- Corners of the Earth Building Pack: Pyramids of Giza, Petra, Hadrian’s Wall, Charlemagne’s Palace, Visby Ringmur, and the Agra Fort appear on the map
- Finno-Ugric Portrait Pack: New faces for this northern nation
- Indian Boats Unit Pack and Arabic Boats Unit Pack
- Mongol/Steppe Male and Female Councilor Model Pack and
- Western/Christian Female Councilor Model Pack
- New Event Pictures and one new loading screen: because we love our artists

name: Crusader Kings II: Customization Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Crusader Kings II: Europa Universalis IV Converter
description: Sin descripción

name: Crusader Kings II: Ruler Designer
description: Sin descripción

name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 1 - Take Control
description: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 1 - Take Control is the first chapter of Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy.

name: Guards II: Chaos in Hell
description: There is chaos in Hell. Drive a group of heroes through five different underworlds. Survive against tons of evil creatures in amusing turn-based combat to find and face the Devil!

name: Yodel-Oh!
description: Take on Ram-Bam, Lamb-Bam and the whole bleatin' clan in the exciting Alpine climbing adventure that pits your wits against the meanest sheep in the mountain. Loaded with half-crazed herds, twisting targets and awesome fairway sounds, Yodel-Oh is guaranteed to have you yodeling for more.

name: Demon's Bane
description: Save the animal kingdom in this innovative roguelike deckbuilder. Battle enemies, unlock abilities, and customize your deck. With 10 classes, 350+ cards, and a 100 different enemies. Experience strategic card combat with a twist. No In App Purchases.

name: Grapple Cars
description: Party game where you drive bumper cars but with grapple hooks! Grapple Cars is a 2-4 player party game where your only means of movement is using a grapple hooks to pull and slingshot your bumper car around the level.

name: Elite Status: Platinum Concierge
description: Find the unfindable and do the impossible? It’s all in a day’s work for you. As a concierge, how far will you go to make billionaires’ dreams come true?

name: The Girl Who Kicked a Rabbit
description: The Girl Who Kicked a Rabbit is a tight, turn-based JRPG-lite for those who want just the meaty part. Kill cute enemies, collect loot, and build devastating new spells. Then do it all over again.

name: Monkey Math
description: Inspired by DK Jr. Math. A mathematical puzzle game to test your speed and knowledge of endless mathematical operations! Compete against your friends or compete against your personal best to improve your high score. There's monkey's, there's math, it's Monkey Math!

name: Vegangsters
description: A 2D roguelike that brings deckbuilding games to the next level! Set in a world full of crime, you will take control of a potato inspector that uses cards to arrest criminal vegetables.

name: Ned
description: Blast your way through hordes of enemies in Ned! An action-packed adventure platformer set in the rich history of the Aussie outback.

name: Koi Zen: Opposite Colors
description: Immerse yourself in a vibrant and tranquil puzzle game, featuring elegant koi fish to enhance your gameplay. Take control of both the white and black pieces to paint the board with amazing colors.

name: Doozie the Unicorn
description: Doozie the Unicorn, a Gothic, Dark Fantasy, Medieval, Action, Adventure, Fairy-Tale.

name: Gate of Souls
description: I got a job as a night guard. They promise to pay a lot, but for my own safety I have to follow strange rules. As you progress, you'll have to find keys and open locked rooms. A first-person game with elements of horror. Explore the hospital and its rooms, collect batteries for your flashlight.

name: Duck Life 9: The Flock
description: Raise your ducklings into the ultimate team of racers in Duck Life 9, where everything is bigger, bolder & more beautiful than ever before! Embark on a quest as you journey across the huge Featherhaven Island, meeting new friends & taking on recruits to help topple the competition & take the crown!

name: Kenny 7
description: In the near future, machines have taken over the world. Every 5 years, new models are produced that are always more advanced. The old models are destroyed because they are considered too obsolete. Kenny_7 models whose AI has failed have risen up against the established order. You are one of them.

name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 2 - The Lustrous of the Universe
description: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 2 - The Lustrous of the Universe is the second chapter of Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy.

name: Sex Hotel Simulator
description: Sex Hotel Simulator is an adult Visual novel with the mechanics of pumping a hotel . Welcome to the captivating world of "Sex Hotel Simulator," where you'll take on the role of a brothel owner and elevate it to the pinnacle of fame and success!

name: Ancient Wonders: Pharaoh's Tomb
description: The Pharaoh is dead and It's time to finalize the preparation of the Tomb. Play through more than 100 levels and earn enough gold to fully decorate the Tomb of the Pharaoh!

name: Blade and Burden
description: Blade and Burden is a rogue lite dungeon crawler where different adventurers slash, roll, and solve their way through a trick filled tower in order to reach their own goals, whether that be to save a kidnapped royal, complete a contracted hit, or just to cure their boredom.

name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 3 - The Final Rave
description: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy: Chapter 3 - The Final Rave is the third and final chapter in Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy.

name: Rift Loopers: Pyro Class
description: Get access to the Pyro class and their arsenal

name: The Last Veggies
description: The Last Veggies is a 2d top-down shooter roguelite where you play as a farmer or his friends fighting hordes of monsters while trying to save humanity by delivering fresh veggies. Play different maps with different characters and an always changing set of Items and Upgrades.

name: RoboHunt
description: RoboHunt - fast top-down action shooter where you have to destroy a lot of robots. You will have to uncover the secrets of abandoned robotics labs and find a way to escape from the planet.

name: Chronicles of Vipers
description: Chronicles of Vipers is a remake-demake first-person shooter inspired by old 8-bit and 16-bit console games, as well as VHS-era movies.

name: Hero's Way
description: Arcade-role playing game with drag-n-drop mechanics.

name: Crimsonland
description: Top-down arena shooter video game with role-playing elements. It was developed by Finnish studio 10tons Entertainment and published by Reflexive Entertainment in 2003. In 2014 an enhanced re-release followed.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Misterix
description: A San Andreas hack that adds old school myths and classic horror monsters into the game for you to hunt!

name: Path to the Unknown
description:
"Path to the Unknown" is an exciting adventure that will transport you to a world of mysteries, puzzles, and challenges. In this game, you take on the role of a courageous explorer embarking on a journey through unknown territories to uncover ancient secrets.

The game features a variety of brain teasers, complex puzzles, and intriguing riddles. You will explore abandoned and forgotten places, decipher codes, and discover hidden clues that will lead you to the next part of the puzzle.

At every turn, you will encounter new challenges and mysteries to unravel in order to progress on your journey. Your logical thinking, wit, and observation skills will be crucial. Collect indicators, find unlocked doors, and pave your way to the ultimate revelation.

Can you solve all the puzzles, overcome obstacles, and reach the final destination of your journey? Your adventure begins here. Embark on the "Path to the Unknown" and unlock a world of mysteries!

name: CyberThreat
description: CyberThreat is an upcoming turn based RPG with life simulation elements, set in a modern day city. Can you win the war in CyberSpace, or will you fall to the viruses once and for all?

name: Last Life
description: Last Life is a breathtaking adventure game set in NeoNova, a cyberpunk city where high technology and dark secrets intertwine. Our protagonist, a cute cat controlled by players, will embark on a mysterious journey to find their lost lover.

name: WildCraft
description: Wildcraft: Embark on a Thrilling Journey of Online Survival Crafting Game that takes players on a captivating adventure in a vast and beautifully rendered 3D environment.

name: While Waiting
description: A transformative adventure exploring the art of waiting. Clear the game by doing nothing, but discover the power of acceptance and patience in 100+ situations from birth to death. Learn to embrace life as you wait.

name: Wendigo
description: A stealth horror game in the woods, investigate and progress while drawing as little attention to yourself as possible.

name: War and Peace
description: This is a unique online strategy where you can fully control each fighter and squad. Find the enemy's weak points, create complex tactical maneuvers on the battlefield, and enjoy exciting battles. Each battle is a real test of your tactical skills and abilities

name: The Maze
description: The Maze: a roguelite, maze-solving adventure fusing retro & modern co-op gameplay. Master a simple interface, explore intricate levels with varied mechanics & game modes. Outwit opponents in cat-and-mouse chases, dodge dangers, and unlock powers to reach the exit.

name: Speakeasy
description:
Join Cora West for a whirlwind of forbidden romances found in the depths of a decadent illegal jazz club in Prohibition-era Los Angeles. Direct the heroine’s actions and determine whether she will make it out with her heart intact or lose herself in the glamor and excess.

Will you fall in love? Rule the city? Or damn it all and descend into ruin?

name: Sinister
description: An immersive 2D horror game set in an alternative Victorian London, with a horrifying fourth wall breaking twist.

name: Slag
description: You are tasked with servicing Terraformer Ai cores. To do this you will have to blast your way through the automated defense system. Turn the bots you come across into slag and get what "res" you can out of them as you will need it to load out your tank with different weapon and mods systems.

name: Sold Out
description: You play as a grocery store owner with limited starting capital and the only thing you can rely on is your business acumen. You will use operations such as purchasing, hoarding, and selling to satisfy your customers, so as to earn enough profits, um, and the rent that keeps rising.

name: Plasmatic
description: Plasmatic is a virtual space in which our society has been closed with its own approval. We wake up from it unexpectedly. Our goal is to repair the main simulation core of Plasmatic. The continuation of life lived in it before will not be possible without the reparation…

name: Presence
description: Investigate, explore, and solve paranormal phenomena using technology as well as your own esoteric abilities, alone or with friends.

name: Ground Zero
description: Fight through post-apocalyptic South Korea in this retro survival horror. Uncover the truth behind the devastating meteor impact that left the country in ruins and turned every living organism into a terrifying monstrosity. Fight. Solve puzzles. Upgrade gear. Make every bullet count.

name: Endless Dream
description: This game is a suspense micro fear love to AVG game, a total of three men can fall in love; Different male characters will bring you unique love experience.

name: Cosmic Carnage
description: Prepare for an interstellar showdown like no other in a gripping roguelite/roguelike top-down twin-stick shooter set in the vast depths of space. Pilot your advanced starship, engaging in relentless battles against hordes of alien adversaries. Destroy, Collect, Upgrade, Die, Unlock, Repeat.

name: Overlewd
description: Follow along on a journey to catch all them hotties! Overlewd is a 3v3 turn-based RPG battler for everyone to enjoy. Control battles with ultimate spells and strategic targeting keeps you on your toes. Manage your castle and increase your might following stories about your harem.

name: Arknights: Release
description:
Arknights: Release is a fan-made game based on the Arknights IP using the Ikemen Go engine.

The game has various modes to choose from, such as arcade, two-player, online multiplayer, survival, lord conquest and so on. Currently, only arcade, two-player, survival and lord conquest are released in the test version.

name: Garestia
description: Garestia is an online multiplayer battle Game with Sexual Content and Nudity.

name: C17
description: Use keyboard and mouse to control characters to avoid monster attacks

name: Imaginary Girl: Prequel
description: The future art will be drawn by two people... Platonic love? Drawing? Adventure game?

name: After School
description: Indie horror game, in which you will explore cursed school complex.

name: Nine Paradise: The Origin
description: A Roguelike card game. In addition to hundreds of basic cards, there are also unique ways to practice martial arts and spells, and dozens of powerful magic artifacts and pets with their own characteristics, making the game more fun.

name: Sneak Out
description: Sneak Out is a crazy hide & seek game in a huge magical castle with up to 5 hiders playing against one dangerous seeker. Maybe you will be sneaky enough to complete all the tasks and get out of the mysterious castle or enough determined to hunt everyone else down.

name: Delearnia: Fractions of Hope
description: Delearnia: Fractions of Hope is a thrilling puzzle adventure where action, mystery, and mathematics collide. Navigate the enchanting world of Delearnia, conquer challenges, and defeat enemies with the power of mathematics. Rediscover the fun in being a thinker. Become the Mathemagician!

name: Hidden Pass
description: Hidden Pass is a tactical turn-based RPG with base management that blends tactics with fascinating visual effects. The game sets in unique technomagic fantasy world. Plan your steps carefully while you lead an expedition to the center of a vast cluster of uncharted isles floating high in the sky.

name: Rush On
description: Fast, score-based endless runner with procedurally generated levels. Perfect for a quick, intense game whenever you got a few minutes.

name: Bucket Brawl: Ahlman Edition
description: A fast-paced arena fighter where animal toys seek to recycle each other in a world of plastic and raining buckets. Throw buckets on the heads of other players, push them off a ledge and be the last toy standing.

name: The Witch In The Woods
description: Deep in the perilous Greywind Forest reside a mysterious witch. She is rumored to be evil and dangerous. Nellie has her own reason to enter the forest. When she encounters the witch, what will happen? This is a light yuri fantasy visual novel.

name: Desolated District
description: Desolated District is an open world survival game. Loot, craft, build and fight in a post-apocalyptic dystopia, alone or with friends. Explore the dark and dangerous depths of the city while looking for a way out.

name: Spyro the Dragon 8
description: Spyro the Dragon 8 is an LCD game created for distribution at McDonald's restaurants. They were offered as a part of Happy Meals for a limited time in 2005 to promote Crash Purple and Spyro Orange.

name: F-4 Phantom II: Sky Defender
description: Sin descripción

name: Boatgator
description: Sin descripción

name: Terminal
description: Sin descripción

name: Off-World Relocation
description: Sin descripción

name: Cupid
description:
CUPID is a logic puzzle game made for the Game Boy Color.

Something or someone has broken the Heart, a magical relic that stitches all things together. Without it, the universe will slowly unravel and everything will fall into darkness. Play as a cute little Cupid, tasked with mending the broken Heart. Do your best to spread love and happiness to all that you meet and prevent the darkness from taking hold!

name: Soulknight Survivor
description: Soulknight Survivor is a topdown action-roguelite game. Survive the waves of enemys to unlock new areas. Level up your character and loot equipment to gain power. Craft new powerful equipment and upgrade the buildings of your hometown. Follow your way to become the Soulknight.

name: Pop and Chicks
description: Help Pop the hen rescue her chicks. Take one move at a time, and be careful where you're going.

name: Firestorm Deadland
description: Firestorm Deadland is a first-person shooter survival horror game where you have to survive as much time as you can by defending the world against unHumans and unknown species in the year 2063.

name: Project Hardline
description: Project Hardline is a party first person shooter game where two teams fight to capture an uplink station. This uplink station contains vital intel and must not fall into the wrong hands. With every round a team faces, they will come back with better gear. This game is perfect for a party of friends.

name: Rafting Frenzy
description: It's rafting time! Rafting Frenzy is a rafting game where you're going to need both luck and skill to get a big score on either racing or free rafting modes.

name: Quatro!: This is fine DLC
description: Heat Up With the Quatro! This is fine DLC

name: Paradise Lust 2
description: Continue your adventures on Tuvatuva island in a sultry 2D point-and-click adventure where romance blooms, fish are caught, drinks are served, puzzles are solved, and passion ignites in paradise.

name: Drill Keeper
description: Drill Keeper combines roguelite deckbuilding and tower defense into a strategic battle for survival. Dig through completely destructible worlds to strip them of their riches and build an impenetrable fortress of mining.

name: Gravity Waves
description: Gravity Waves is a twin stick shoot 'em up in space with waves of enemies and realistic gravity to provide constantly changing gameplay.

name: Hexguardian
description: A Roguelite tower defense game where you can shape the terrain yourself. Build roads and rivers, construct defense towers and economic buildings, recruit units, learn spells, and defeat various enemies from land, water and air. Hundreds of unique talents and combinations await you to dig out!

name: Elemental Odyssey
description: Elemental Odyssey is 2D platformer where you need to RUN, JUMP, SLIDE, AVOID TRAPS, and don't let the game make you mad!!

name: Agents of SomeCompany
description: Unleash your speedrunning skills and complete your missions as fast as you can in this first-person parkour platformer. Speed through the low-poly world and compete with other players to prove you're SomeCompany's best agent.

name: Damned 2
description: Damned 2 is a asymmetrical multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where a group of survivors must come together to solve puzzles and escape an immersive environment while another player takes the role of a unbeatable monster ready to slay all trespassers.

name: Patou
description: When Kit finds herself all alone in a dream-like world, giant dog Patou comes along. On their journey home, strange creatures and lonely spirits await, guarding ruins of memories buried deep.

name: Aftershock: Coastline
description: Aftershock: Coastline is a thrilling retro-styled survival horror shooter inspired by the design of Resident Evil and the atmosphere of Bioshock. Spend an hour delving deep into a seaside bunker in an uncanny land, uncovering its secrets and surviving against the cosmic horrors which dwell within.

name: Bennu Bennu: Protect the Pyramid
description: In this fast-paced, cooperative wave defence game, you ARE the towers. Defeat wave after wave, create powerful combos and personalize your playstyle through the randomized upgrade system. Every round is different!

name: Eris Dysnomia
description: In a world of monsters and peril, Eris finds herself alone with nothing but her trusty scythe. To save herself from the onslaught of enemies, she must kick and punch her way out of danger and defeat the enemies that stand in her path to salvation.

name: The Backrooms Origins
description: Enter the Backrooms and search for truth. Be careful in there! Because they are coming for you!

name: Dan Factory
description: You are reincarnated into a valley full of spiritual energy, using the Eight Trigrams Formation to complete the automated production of elixirs, and exploring the past stories of this continent in the world of monsters and monsters;

name: While Waiting My Turn
description: Discover the joy of building tiny structures with board game pieces in this relaxing game. Stack and create unique buildings. Complete optional tasks that fuel your creativity. Construct whatever you want – no puzzles to solve, no races to win.
